list.name: Meade AutoStar compatible
list.description: Any telescope or telescope mount compatible with Meade's AutoStar controller.

list.name: Meade LX200 (compatible)
list.description: Any telescope or telescope mount compatible with Meade LX200.

list.name: Meade ETX70 (#494 Autostar, #506 CCS)
list.description: Meade's ETX70 with the #494 Autostar controller and the #506 Connector Cable Set.

list.name: Wildcard Innovations Argo Navis (Meade mode)
list.description: Wildcard Innovations' Argo Navis DTC in Meade LX200 emulation mode (<tt>SETUP SERIAL</tt>, then <tt>STARTUP=meade</tt> and <tt>BAUD=9600</tt>).

list.name: Celestron NexStar (compatible)
list.description: Any telescope or telescope mount compatible with Celestron NexStar.

list.name: Sky-Watcher SynScan (version 3 or later)
list.description: Any Sky-Watcher mount that uses version 3 or later of the SynScan hand controller.

list.name: Sky-Watcher SynScan AZ GOTO
list.description: The Sky-Watcher SynScan AZ GOTO mount used in a number of telescope models.
